title: Featured spectate only showing ARAM and Blind pick matches?
body: Is this going to become a permanent thing? I personally enjoyed watching the high elo ranked games and would love if I could do so once again.

replies.body: We are aware of this! Thanks for the report.
Hey Exgeniar could i get a followup for the Jayce bug? There a few more posts that shed more light on that issue.
Any update on this because it's still going on.

OMG I thought it was just me since I have been playing only ARAM since ranked solo isn't out yet >.<"

Thank you so much OP for bringing this up.
YES Please! i'm getting really sick of watching the garbage ball that is normal draft! Please bring back the Ranked featured games.
